SADA Intelligent Solutions is a software outsourcing company, specialized in Big Data, Machine Learning, NLP (Natural Language Processing), and AI.
The company was founded back in 2018, since then SADA has been focusing on providing cutting-edge solutions for its clients.
In addition to the aforementioned specialization, SADA offers other software services to complement its offering for the clients, so they can get end-to-end solutions.
These services include among others Custom Software Development, Full Stack Web Development, Cloud Consulting and Migration.
